title: Kai'sa butt
body:
http://www.lol-wallpapers.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/KDA-KaiSa-2-Splash-Art-HD-Wallpaper-Background-Official-Art-Artwork-League-of-Legends-lol-1.jpg
Yeah, we need it to be bigger than this, okay. Some say it's big enough as it is, I say we need to go deeper. Let's not take any ideas off the table, okay? I'll start!
https://i.imgur.com/i1j4XdW.png
Let's just ask riot to buff that booty until it can fit atleast 9 fed Cho'Gaths on it.

replies.body: Only if the hair buns get an equal size increase
I'm going to hell for this
